author_id.description: The unique identifier of the author who created the article.

body.description: The main content or body of the article.

comments_disabled.description: Indicates whether comments are disabled for the article.

content_tag_ids.description: An array of unique identifiers of content tags associated with the article.

created_at.description: The date and time when the article was created.

draft.description: Indicates whether the article is in draft mode.

edited_at.description: The date and time when the article was last edited.

html_url.description: The URL of the article in HTML format.

id.description: The unique identifier of the article.

label_names.description: An array of label names associated with the article.

locale.description: The language locale of the article.

outdated.description: Indicates whether the article is outdated.

outdated_locales.description: An array of language locales in which the article is outdated.

permission_group_id.description: The unique identifier of the permission group for the article.

position.description: The position order of the article within its section.

promoted.description: Indicates whether the article is promoted.

section_id.description: The unique identifier of the section to which the article belongs.

source_locale.description: The original language locale of the article.

title.description: The title or heading of the article.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the article was last updated.

user_segment_id.description: The unique identifier of the user segment targeted by the article.

vote_count.description: The total count of votes received for the article.

vote_sum.description: The sum of votes received for the article (considering upvotes and downvotes).
